column4: Hi :) I've a little problem. I've to intall a Ubuntu Livecd, but i haven't got a cd reader :P Can i copy the cd contents into a folder (or a partition) and use grub to boot it?
Hi :) I've a little problem. I've to intall a Ubuntu Livecd, but i haven't got a cd reader :P Can i copy the cd contents into a folder (or a partition) and use grub to boot it?
My old laptop don't support USB boot :( :(
